    3M Particulate Respirator, 8210, N95

    • [shortdesc]

    Pre-Order Product

    Product currently on backorder. Reserve your place in queue to receive the product once stock is replenished.

    In Stock Covid-19 products here

    3M Organic Vapour/Acid Gas Cartridge, 6003

  • 3M™ Organic Vapour/Acid Gas Cartridge 6003 helps provide respiratory protection against certain organic vapours or acid gasses
  • Use with 3M™ Half and Full Facepieces 6000, 7000 and FF-400 Series with bayonet filter holders.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Cartridge Filters

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ Organic Vapour/Acid Gas Cartridge 6003 helps provide organic vapour and acid gas protection in a variety of environments
  • When properly used with an approved 3M respirator properly fitted, this respirator cartridge helps provide respiratory protection from certain organic vapours, chlorine, hydrogen chloride, sulfur dioxide, chlorine dioxide, hydrogen sulfide, or hydrogen fluoride
  • The cartridge may be used for vapour concentrations up to 10 times the Permissible Exposure Limit (PEL) with half facepieces or 50 times PEL with quantitatively fit tested full facepieces
  • Recommended applications for the cartridge include assembly and mechanical, batch-charging, change-overs, chemical dispensing, clean-up, cleaning, handling, painting, parts cleaning, pesticide application, powder, and seal coating
  • Inventory needs and training requirements for safety equipment are reduced because this respirator cartridge selection works for many different applications
  • This cartridge is commonly used in the following industries: agriculture, aluminum reduction, chemical manufacturing, laboratories, petrochemical, pharmaceuticals, pulp and paper, and utilities.

    • Product Information

  • NIOSH approved for protection against certain organic vapours or acid gasses
  • Swept-back design allows an enhanced field of view and comfort
  • Bayonet compatibility allows use with many 3M™ Half and Full Facepiece designs
  • Wide range of applications reduces inventory needs
  • Simple installation and usage requirements reduce training needs

    • Suggested Application

  • This organic vapor/acid gas cartridge can be used for a variety of applications, including: pharmaceutical, petrochemical, utilities, aluminum reduction, chemical manufacturing, laboratories, and pulp and paper
  • Swept-back design offers enhanced comfort and visibility.
  • When properly used with an approved 3M respirator properly fitted, this respirator cartridge helps provide respiratory protection from certain organic vapors, chlorine, hydrogen chloride, sulfur dioxide, chlorine dioxide, hydrogen sulfide or hydrogen fluoride.
  • For use in concentrations up to 10 times the Permissible Exposure Limit (PEL) with half facepiece and full facepiece respirators when qualitatively fit-tested, or up to 50 times PEL with full facepiece respirators when quantitatively fit-tested.Please refer to specific provincial regulation for appropriate assigned protection factors for full face respirators.
  • Not for use in environments that are immediately dangerous to life or health (IDLH).
    		•

    Our team is working diligently to expedite and keep customers informed. We are sorry for the inconvenience and will continue to do our very best to assist you.     [shortdesc]

    IN STOCK - READY TO SHIP

    While supplies last

    For Covid-19 related products click here!

    Particulate Filter, 2097, P100, with nuisance level organic vapour relief

  • 3M™ Particulate Filter 2097 with nuisance level organic vapour relief helps provide respiratory protection against exposure to lead, asbestos, cadmium, arsenic, and MDA
  • The filter is effective for concentrations up to 10 times the Permissible Exposure Limit (PEL) with half facepieces, or 50 times PEL with quantitatively fit tested full facepieces
  • This filter helps protect against a wide range of oil and non-oil based particulate contaminants
  • The filter also offers nuisance level odour relief from organic vapours that are below the PEL
  • Nuisance level refers to concentrations not exceeding OSHA PEL or other applicable government exposure limits, whichever is lower
  • Do not use for respiratory protection against organic vapours or in environments that are Immediately Dangerous to Life or Health (IDLH)
  • The 2097 is commonly used for welding, brazing, torch cutting, metal pouring and soldering
  • Inventory needs and training requirements of safety equipment are reduced because this filter works for many different applications
  • The filter is both flame and water resistant
  • This filter is commonly used in the following industries: agriculture, construction, general manufacturing, pharmaceuticals, primary metals.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Product Type Pancake Filetrs

    Extra Product Information

  • The 3M™ Particulate Filter 2097 is NIOSH approved for environments containing certain oil and non-oil based particles
  • 3M recommended for nuisance level organic vapour relief and for ozone protection up to 10X OSHA PEL.

    • Product Information

  • Nuisance level organic vapour relief
  • Welding
  • Brazing
  • Soldering
  • Metal pouring
  • Torch cutting
  • Exposure to lead, asbestos, cadmium, arsenic, and MDA

    • Suggested Application

  • NIOSH approved for environments containing certain oil and non-oil-based particles
  • Bayonet compatibility allows use with many 3M™ Half and Full Facepiece Designs
  • Nuisance level organic vapour relief
  • Advanced Electret Media (AEM) provides lightweight, easy breathing comfort

  • 3M provides test kits and accessories designed to help your organization meet CSA respiratory standard Z94.4 and US OSHA fit testing requirements for respirators
  • This accessory is part of a kit that can be used to check face-to-respirator seal on any particulate respirator or gas/vapour respirator with a particulate prefilter.
    		•

    • [shortdesc]

    Pre-Order Product

    Product currently on backorder. Reserve your place in queue to receive the product once stock is replenished.

    In Stock Covid-19 products here

    3M Formaldehyde/Organic Vapour Cartridge, 6005

  • 3M™ Formaldehyde/Organic Vapour Cartridge 6005 is NIOSH approved against formaldehyde and certain organic vapours
  • Use with 3M™ Half and Full Facepieces 6000, 7000 and FF-400 Series with bayonet filter holders.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Accessories

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ Formaldehyde/Organic Vapour Cartridge 6005 can be used in a variety of applications, including laboratories, wood processing, carpet manufacturing, and primary metals manufacturing
  • When properly fitted, helps provide respiratory protection from formaldehyde and certain organic vapours at concentrations up to 10 times the Permissible Exposure Limit (PEL) with half facepieces or 50 times PEL with full facepieces
  • Full facepieces must be quantitatively fit tested to claim assigned protection factor above 10 in negative pressure mode
  • Not for use in environments that are Immediately Dangerous to Life or Health (IDLH)
  • OSHA requires that gas-proof goggles be worn with half facepiece respirators when used against formaldehyde.

    • Product Information

  • Formaldehyde and organic vapour cartridge
  • Swept-back design for enhanced field of view and balance
  • Use with 3M™ Reusable Respirators

    • Suggested Application

  • Use in a variety of applications, including laboratories, wood processing, carpet manufacturing, and primary metals manufacturing
  • When properly fitted, helps provide respiratory protection from formaldehyde and certain organic vapors at concentrations up to 10 times the Permissible Exposure Limit (PEL) with half facepieces or 50 times PEL with full facepieces
  • Full facepieces must be quantitatively fit tested to claim assigned protection factor above 10 in negative pressure mode
  • Please refer to specific provincial regulation for appropriate assigned protection factors for full face respirators.Not for use in environments that are immediately dangerous to life or health (IDLH).

    • [shortdesc]

    Pre-Order Product

    Product currently on backorder. Reserve your place in queue to receive the product once stock is replenished.

    In Stock Covid-19 products here

    3M Hydrogen Fluoride Cartridge/Filter, 7093C, P100

  • The 3M™ Hydrogen Fluoride Cartridge/Filter 7093C is NIOSH approved and provides protection against hydrogen fluoride and oil/non-oil based particles
  • It provides Nuisance Level Organic vapour (OV) and Acid Gas (AG) Relief* when used with 3M™ Half and Full Facepiece Respirators 6000, 7000 and FF-400 Series with bayonet filter holders.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Canada
    Product Type Cartridge Filters

    Extra Product Information

  • When properly fitted, the 3M™ Hydrogen Fluoride Cartridge/Filter 7093C/37173 can be used in a variety of applications including welding, brazing torch cutting, metal pouring, soldering and exposure to lead, asbestos, cadmium, arsenic, MDA and HF for concentrations up to 10 times the Permissible Exposure Limit (PEL) with half facepieces or 50 times PEL with full facepieces
  • This filter also provides nuisance level* protection against OV and AG exposures
  • Full facepieces must be quantitatively fit tested to claim assigned protection factor above 10 in negative pressure mode
  • Do not use in environments that are Immediately Dangerous to Life or Health (IDLH)
  • NIOSH approved for hydrogen fluoride and certain oil and non-oil based particles
  • 3M recommended for relief against nuisance levels* of organic vapour/acid gases
  • Commonly used in the Abatement market, the filter is encapsulated in a hard shell to help protect it from the decontaminating water spray showers.

    • Product Information

  • NIOSH approved for hydrogen fluoride and certain oil and non-oil based particles with relief against nuisance levels of organic vapor/acid gases.
  • Bayonet compatibility allows use with many 3M™ Half and Full Facepiece Designs
  • To establish cartridge replacement frequency visit: 3M.com/ServiceLifeSoftware
  • Advanced Electret Media (AEM) provides lightweight, easy breathing comfort
    		•
